meta.name: Generate AI Videos from Text or Images with Veo 3 API and VietVid.com

parameters.content:
## STEP 1 - GET API KEY (YOURAPIKEY)
- Create an account [here](https://vietvid.com/api) and obtain your API key.
- This key will be required in later steps.
- Important: Keep your key safe and never share it with others.

## STEP 2 - ENTER PROMPT INFORMATION
Fill out the required fields in the form:
- **Prompt**: Describe your video idea in English (e.g., "A robot dancing under neon lights").
- **Image URL (optional)**: Add 1 image link (JPG/PNG) for image-to-video, or leave empty for text-to-video.
- **Aspect Ratio**: Choose 16:9 (landscape), 9:16 (portrait), or 1:1 (square).
- **Seeds (optional)**: A random number between 10000–99999 for consistent results.
- **API Key**: Paste the key obtained in Step 1.

## STEP 4 - WAIT FOR VIDEO CREATION
The workflow will **automatically check (poll)** every 10 seconds until the video URL is available.

**Status Check**
- **Method:** GET
- **URL:** https://vietvid.com/api/n8n/video-status/{{taskId}}
- **Headers:** Authorization: Bearer {{API_KEY}}

**Expected Response**
- **videoUrl:** always returns 720p (faster)
- **hdVideoUrl:** returns 1080p when ready (only for 16:9)
- **status:** "processing" (HD not ready) or "completed" (video ready)

**Tips**
- Use a Wait node (10s delay) between checks.
- Typical time: 720p ~1–3 min, 1080p ~2–3 min.

## STEP 5 - RECEIVE COMPLETED VIDEO LINK
When status = **completed**, the API will return the video link.

**Response Example**
```
{
  "success": true,
  "status": "completed",
  "videoUrl": "https://tempfile.aiquickdraw.com/p/video_720p.mp4",
  "hdVideoUrl": "https://tempfile.aiquickdraw.com/p/video_1080p.mp4",
  "resolution": "1080p",
  "taskId": "task-YOUR_OPENAI_KEY_HERE"
}
```
**Notes**
- **videoUrl**: always contains 720p.
- **hdVideoUrl**: only available for 16:9; null for 9:16/1:1.
- Save these URLs to use in the next workflow step (download, embed, or publish).

## STEP 3 - SUBMIT REQUEST (AUTO POST)
The workflow will automatically **POST** your inputs to VietVid.com to generate the video.

**HTTP Request**
- **Method:** POST
- **URL:** https://vietvid.com/api/n8n/generate
- **Headers:**
  - Authorization: Bearer {{API_KEY}}
  - Content-Type: application/json

**Sample Body**
```
{
  "prompt": "A cute cat playing in a garden",
  "model": "veo3_fast",
  "aspectRatio": "16:9",
  "seeds": 12345,
  "imageUrls": ["https://example.com/image.jpg"]
}
```

## Overview
This workflow uses the VietVid.com Veo3 engine to create AI-powered videos from either text prompts or images. Through a simple form, users can provide a description, optionally attach an image URL for image-to-video, and choose the video aspect ratio (16:9 or 9:16). The request is then sent to the VietVid.com API, which is polled until the video is complete, and the final video link is returned. This workflow is a cost-effective solution for creators, educators, and businesses to generate personalized videos quickly and easily.

## Pricing Advantage
- Videos start at only **$0.4 per 8-second clip**.
- Billing is based on **credit packages**.
- **No expiration date** on credits—use them whenever you want.

## Prerequisites
- A VietVid.com account and valid API key: Register at [VietVid.com](https://vietvid.com) to obtain your free or paid key.
- An active n8n instance (cloud or self-hosted) with HTTP Request and form submission.
- Basic knowledge of prompt design for better AI results.
- (Optional) An image URL if you want to generate videos from images.

## Setup Instructions
1. **Get API Key**: Log in at VietVid.com and generate your personal API key. Keep it secure.
2. **Configure the Form**: Ensure the following fields exist: prompt (video description), img_url (optional), aspectRatio (16:9 or 9:16), api_key.
3. **Run a Test**:
   - Execute the workflow in n8n.
   - Open the generated form link, submit your prompt and API key.
   - The system checks every 10 seconds until the video is ready.
4. **Outputs**: The final node displays the video URL for download or embedding.

## Customization Tips
- **Better Prompts**: Add details like video length, visual style (cinematic, animated, realistic), and actions to improve quality.
- **SEO Focus**: Ideal for keywords around AI video generation, text-to-video tools, Veo3 API automation, and affordable content creation.
